writing_guidelines.description: Product titles are extremely valuable pieces of content. Good titles drive discoverability, customer decision making, SEO/SEM, and make for a better user experience.
Describes the product in 3-5 bullet points, usually the first three bullets highlight key features.
An overview of the key selling points and brand personality, formatted in a 2-3 sentence description.
Identifies product's key features while ensuring technical terms are explained for customer understanding.
